title: Forgotten Mistress, Secret Love-Child
description: A lavish masquerade ball is no place for plain-Jane receptionist Carys Wells. Used to being unnoticed by the glitterati, Carys feels vulnerable and exposed by the searing gaze of a dark masked man. Little does she know he's the man she ran from two years ago, whose wicked touch is about to become her undoing once more….Alessandro Mattani cannot remember Carys, but his body does ... intimately. And the red-blooded Italian is determined to claim all that he believes is his ….
author: Annie West
